name: Rohith Krishna R D

full_output.summary: Enthusiastic and dedicated data science student with a strong foundation in analytical and technical skills. Currently seeking an internship opportunity to apply classroom learning to real-world projects and gain practical experience in data analysis, machine learning, and statistical modeling. Eager to contribute to a dynamic team and continue learning and growing in the field of data science.

projects.name: Ensou
projects.description: A music system that uses K-means clustering for personalized song recommendations. Implemented a doubly linked circular linked list for song navigation and playback control, offering features like repeat, and lyric display. Designed the frontend using HTML/CSS, JavaScript and Flask framework.

projects.name: HotelHub-Pro
projects.description: A hotel management system using MySQL, with a server-client architecture. It does hotel operations, including room bookings, guest management, and PDF bill generation, all integrated with databases for efficient data management. The frontend is done using HTML/CSS and Flask as backend framework.

projects.name: Sign-Language-Recognition
projects.description: Implemented a real-time Sign Language Recognition system using Support Vector Machines (SVM) to interpret American Sign Language (ASL) gestures. Leveraged Python, OpenCV, Mediapipe, Scikit-Learn, and Streamlit for hand gesture capture, analysis, and symbol prediction.

projects.name: NewsPalette
projects.description: A News classification project where we have analyzed a dataset of news headlines and descriptions using python and used Naive bayes classifier to train a model to classify a set of headlines and its description into its respective news categories and display the categorized news using streamlit.

full_output.name: Rohith Krishna R D
